alert.note: Alert for Mt. Hood National Forest - West of Cascade Crest; North Oregon Cascade Foothills; Willamette National Forest (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 15 at 4:50PM PDT until October 16 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT SUNDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 605, 607, AND 660... * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, Fire Weather Zone 605 North Oregon Cascade Foothills, Fire Weather Zone 607 Mt. Hood National Forest West of Cascade Crest and Fire Weather Zone 608 Willamette National Forest. * WINDS...East 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for rapid fire spread which may threaten life and property. Use extra caution with potential ignition sources, especially in grassy areas. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Mt. Hood National Forest - West of Cascade Crest; North Oregon Cascade Foothills; Willamette National Forest
